scenario: Alice received the following amounts during the year: Loan Proceeds: $10,104.81, Wages: $1,801.77, Gift from Parents: $7,698.02, Gambling Winnings: $26,725.42.
question: Calculate Alice's gross income under I.R.C. § 61.
answer_explanation: Gross income includes all income from whatever source derived, unless excluded. Total: $28,527.19.
reasoning: Summed included items, ignored excluded items (Gifts, Loans, etc.).
